name: Cooperative Education Ventures
tag_list: education, higher-education, career-management, education-technology, education-services, education-management
overview:
We are establishing a groundbreaking cooperative institute that will offer highly effective and personalized educational programs designed to rapidly prepare students for successful careers and empower them to become engaged citizens and lifelong learners.

With nearly half of U.S. employers struggling to fill open positions and over 3MM jobs going unfilled each month, current university models remain challenged to deploy optimal solutions that bridge the skills gap. As a cooperative, our institution aligns the economic interests and engages students, educators, industry and investors in removing the barriers from education to employment. Our entire organization from enrollment to alumni relations is designed to prepare graduates for workforce success. Our educational programs are developed in collaboration with industry and integrate practical, career-relevant skills and professional attributes for jobs that are in high demand. Our innovative personalized learning system leverages technology and analytics to adapt our programs to students’ needs and abilities and provide academic, motivational and financial support that empowers students to rapidly launch and advance their careers.
